title: Landing page copy update to “All tasks allowed”

requirements.summary: Change only the user-selected LandingScreen feature highlight text and the bottom CTA button label to display “All tasks allowed” (keeping “Logging in...” unchanged).
acceptanceCriteria: On the signed-out landing page, the selected bottom CTA button text is changed to exactly: "All tasks allowed" (keeping the existing loading text "Logging in...").

On the signed-out landing page, at least one of the selected feature highlight text elements (the selected h3 headings and/or the selected paragraph) is updated so it clearly displays the phrase "All tasks allowed" in the visible UI text.
No non-selected elements outside the provided XPath list are modified as part of this change.
All user-facing text introduced/changed by this request is in English.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the user-selected LandingScreen elements (as identified by the provided XPaths): (1) change the bottom CTA Button non-loading label from its current text to exactly "All tasks allowed" while preserving the loading label "Logging in..."; and (2) update at least one of the selected feature highlight text nodes (h3 and/or its accompanying paragraph) so the visible text clearly includes the phrase "All tasks allowed". Do not modify any other copy or elements.
